alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 02 at 2:52PM MST until September 02 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR SELIGMAN, ARIZONA... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Yavapai and Coconino counties in west-central Arizona, including Seligman. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in creeks and normally dry washes is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 247 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 1.75 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Big Chino Wash. Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.75 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Seligman and Seligman Airport. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 120 and 124. Business Interstate 40 between mile markers 140 and 141. Route 66 near mile marker 139. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
